name: Garfield Gators Swim Team
description: Non-competitive swim team for Levels 5 and over. Focuses on team building skills, promotes health and wellness through proper stroke techniques, core strength and endurance training. Good for individuals interested in gaining the foundational skills to pursue competitive swimming or a career in lifeguarding.

howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (415) 831-6800
